title: The new Client - Problems.
body:
So, today I and a lot of people have updated League to the new Client. It looks great but unfortunately it does not work great. It looks modern, yet the looks seem to overload everything and cause HUGE lag when I even open the client. The client, while inactive runs me around 60% of my CPU. When I am in champ select it lags so hard, that I am unable to ban, nor pick a champion which can potentially put me on leavebusters when it wasn't even my fault to begin in.

The game worked fine before the updated rolled out and in my opinion I'd rather get a working client over a client that only higher-end users can use. I do not have a strong computer but my computer is strong and good enough to be able to run the game at a steady 40ish fps. It rarely lags, but the client absolutely eats my computer alive. I can barely get into the game....

I don't know how to fix this problem, any suggestions?

We've seen this happen for some players on lower-spec machines. Since the client is still in Beta, there are bound to be some bumps in the road. Some steps that have worked for some players that experience this is to run windows updates, then [complete a clean boot](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq3) to eliminate any potentially problematic background apps.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
